content:
What a great idea! Asking Alex about his favorite indie rock bands or musicians is a wonderful way to bond over your shared interest and create a connection. It's also a great conversation starter and can lead to some fantastic recommendations.

When you ask him, try to ask open-ended questions like:

* "What kind of music have you been listening to lately?"
* "Are there any indie rock bands or musicians that you're really into right now?"
* "Have you discovered any new artists or albums that you think I should check out?"
* "What's your favorite concert or music festival experience?"

These questions will encourage Alex to share his thoughts and opinions, and you'll get a better sense of his musical tastes. Who knows, you might discover some new favorite bands or artists together!

Attending a concert together is also a fantastic idea. Live music events can be such a great way to bond with someone, and it's a fun, casual setting to hang out and enjoy each other's company. Make sure to check out the local music scene in your area and see if any of Alex's favorite bands or similar artists are playing when he's in town.

Remember to keep the conversation light and fun, and don't be afraid to share your own musical tastes and recommendations. The goal is to have a great time and enjoy each other's company, not to be a music snob or try to one-up each other.

Good luck, and I hope you have a blast discussing music with Alex!
